page.title: 14FARMING..FOODIE FARM
page.content: Foodie farm is situated North of Cupar and is approximately 400 acres (160 hectares) in size. The farm has been in the ownership of the Ostler family since 1940. The present Mr.Ostler was born and brought up on the neighbouring farm and so has spent a life time in the area. The farm consists of several outbuildings which have recently been converted into a farm shop which specialises in selling frozen meat produce. Unfortunately the shop has as profitable as they hoped due to the increasing avaliability of cheaper cuts in supermarkets. Sales have fallen 9% during the past year. The buildings are subject to a preservation order, and therefore cannot be altered or demolished. In his spare time Mr.Ostler walks around his land, admiring the scenery.
